@@ -0,0 +1,53 @@
+Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
+Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.
+Local Open Scope sets.
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  destruct n.
+  * simpl.
+    rewrite H
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+(** 请证明Bourbaki-Witt不动点具有单调性。*)
+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Admitted. (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+

@@ -0,0 +1,59 @@
+Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
+Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.
+Local Open Scope sets.
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.
+Qed.
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+(** 请证明Bourbaki-Witt不动点具有单调性。*)
+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Proof. (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+

@@ -0,0 +1,65 @@
+Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
+Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.
+Local Open Scope sets.
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.
+Qed.
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+(** 请证明Bourbaki-Witt不动点具有单调性。*)
+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Proof.
+  intros;simpl.
+  unfold BW_LFix,omega_lub,oLubA.
+  unfold .
+  
+
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+

+Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.

+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.

+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.
+Qed.
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)

+

+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Proof.
+  intros;simpl.
+  unfold BW_LFix, continuous.
+
+

+Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
+Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.
+Local Open Scope sets.
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.
+Qed.
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+(** 请证明Bourbaki-Witt不动点具有单调性。*)
+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Proof.
+  intros;simpl.
+  unfold BW_LFix.
+  unfold omega_Lub
+
+  
+
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+

@@ -0,0 +1,67 @@
+Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
+Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.
+Local Open Scope sets.
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.
+Qed.
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+(** 请证明Bourbaki-Witt不动点具有单调性。*)
+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Proof.
+  intros;simpl.
+  unfold BW_LFix.
+  unfold continuous in H0,H2.
+  apply is_omega_lub_tight.
+
+  
+
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+

+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
+Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.
+Local Open Scope sets.
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.
+Qed.
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+(** 请证明Bourbaki-Witt不动点具有单调性。*)
+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Proof.
+  intros;simpl.
+  unfold BW_LFix.
+  unfold continuous in H0,H2.
+  unfold mono in H1, H.
+
+
+  
+

+    mono f ->

+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.

+Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
+Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.
+Local Open Scope sets.

+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.
+Qed.
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)

+(** 习题：  *)

+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Proof.
+  intros;simpl.
+  unfold BW_LFix.
+  unfold continuous in H0,H2.
+  unfold mono in H1, H.
+  unfold omega_lub. 
+  apply mono
+
+

+Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
+Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
+Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
+Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
+Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
+Import Lang_SimpleWhile
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
+       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
+Local Open Scope order_scope.
+Local Open Scope sets.
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+
+(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)
+
+Theorem iter_mono:
+  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
+    mono f ->
+    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
+Proof.
+  intros; simpl.
+  induction n.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    tauto.
+  * simpl.
+    unfold mono.
+    intros.
+    apply H,IHn,H0.
+Qed.
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+
+(************)
+(** 习题：  *)
+(************)
+
+(** 请证明Bourbaki-Witt不动点具有单调性。*)
+
+Lemma iter_bot_increasing:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{oCPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    (f: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    increasing (fun n => Nat.iter n f bot).
+Proof.
+  unfold increasing.
+  intros.
+  induction n; simpl.
+  + apply bot_is_least.
+  + apply H.
+    apply IHn.
+Qed.
+
+Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
+  forall
+    {A: Type}
+    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
+    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
+    (f g: A -> A),
+    mono f ->
+    continuous f ->
+    mono g ->
+    continuous g ->
+    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
+    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
+Proof.
+  intros;simpl.
+  unfold BW_LFix.
+  unfold continuous in H0, H2.
+  pose proof iter_bot_increasing H.
+
+
+
+
+
+  
+
+   (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
+
+

commits.content:
Require Import Coq.ZArith.ZArith.
Require Import Coq.Classes.Morphisms.
Require Import SetsClass.SetsClass.
Require Import PL.SyntaxInCoq.
Require Import PL.DenotationalSemantics. Import SetsNotation.
Import Lang_SimpleWhile
       DntSem_SimpleWhile2
       DntSem_SimpleWhile3
       DntSem_SimpleWhile4
       DntSem_SimpleWhile5.
Local Open Scope order_scope.
Local Open Scope sets.

(************)
(** 习题：  *)
(************)


(** 请证明，如果_[f]_是一个单调函数，那么将其迭代_[n]_次后得到的函数依然是单调的。*)

Theorem iter_mono:
  forall {A: Type} `{PO: PartialOrder_Setoid A} (f: A -> A) (n: nat),
    mono f ->
    mono (fun a => Nat.iter n f a).
Admitted. (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)


(************)
(** 习题：  *)
(************)

(** 请证明Bourbaki-Witt不动点具有单调性。*)

Lemma BW_LFix_mono:
  forall
    {A: Type}
    `{CPOA: OmegaCompletePartialOrder_Setoid A}
    {EquivA: Equivalence equiv}
    (f g: A -> A),
    mono f ->
    continuous f ->
    mono g ->
    continuous g ->
    (forall a, f a <= g a) ->
    BW_LFix f <= BW_LFix g.
Admitted. (* 请删除这一行_[Admitted]_并填入你的证明，以_[Qed]_结束。 *)
